lexUnit.name: suspicion.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: a feeling that something is possible or probable or that someone is guilty of a crime or offence.
